    public class BermudanSwaption
extends AbstractLIBORBermudanOption
    Implements a Bermudan swaption product.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Lennart Quante

      • getCloneWithModifiedStartingPeriod

        public BermudanSwaption getCloneWithModifiedStartingPeriod(int startingIndex)
        Clones the option shifting the first exercise date of an Bermudan swaption needed e.g. in method of Andersen-Broadie.
        Parameters:
        startingIndex - first fixing date to be kept
        Returns:
        Clone of the BermudanSwaption with the input starting index.

      • getCloneWithModifiedStartingAndFinalPeriod

        public BermudanSwaption getCloneWithModifiedStartingAndFinalPeriod(int startingIndex,
                                                                   int finalIndex)
        Clones the option shifting the first and the final exercise date of an Bermudan swaption needed e.g. in method of Andersen-Broadie.
        Parameters:
        startingIndex - first fixing date to be kept
        finalIndex - last fixing date to be kept (inclusive)
        Returns:
        Clone of the BermudanSwaption with the input starting index and final incex.
